title: Please Don't Spoil Me
overview: Internet writer Yan Yi Yi entered her own novel and became a vicious female supporter. She fought wits and courage with the emperor to avoid the tragic ending of entering the cold palace but was prompted by the book official that if she did not enter the cold palace according to the plot, she would be obliterated. So Yan Yi Yi survived between maintaining the plot and avoiding a bad ending and secretly falling in love with the emperor.Â
